Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT INDOSSIER.iddom, INDOSSIER.iddoss, INCOMPUN.idproced, INDOSSIER.iduti, INDOSSIER.iddirect, INDOSSIER.idserv, INCOMPUN.lbproced, DIR.lbdirect, SERV.lbserv, UTI.lbuti FROM INDOSSIER LEFT JOIN (SELECT INDIREC.iddirect, INDIREC.lbdirect FROM INDIREC) as DIR ON INDOSSIER.iddirect=DIR.iddirect LEFT JOIN (SELECT INSERV.idserv, INSERV.lbserv FROM INSERV) as SERV ON INDOSSIER.idserv=SERV.idserv LEFT JOIN (SELECT INUTI.idutil, INUTI.lbuti FROM INUTI) as UTI ON INDOSSIER.iduti=UTI.idutil LEFT JOIN INCOMPUN ON INDOSSIER.iddom=INCOMPUN.iddom AND INDOSSIER.iddoss=INCOMPUN.iddoss AND INCOMPUN.defaut=-1 AND INDOSSIER.etatdos<>'A'
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT INDOSSIER.iddom, INDOSSIER.iddoss, INCOMPUN.idproced, INDOSSIER.iduti, INDOSSIER.iddirect, INDOSSIER.idserv, INCOMPUN.lbproced, DIR.lbdirect, SERV.lbserv, UTI.lbuti FROM INDOSSIER LEFT JOIN (SELECT INDIREC.iddirect, INDIREC.lbdirect FROM INDIREC) DIR ON INDOSSIER.iddirect=DIR.iddirect LEFT JOIN (SELECT INSERV.idserv, INSERV.lbserv FROM INSERV) SERV ON INDOSSIER.idserv=SERV.idserv LEFT JOIN (SELECT INUTI.idutil, INUTI.lbuti FROM INUTI) UTI ON INDOSSIER.iduti=UTI.idutil LEFT JOIN INCOMPUN ON INDOSSIER.iddom=INCOMPUN.iddom AND INDOSSIER.iddoss=INCOMPUN.iddoss AND INCOMPUN.defaut=-1 AND INDOSSIER.etatdos<>'A'
Vue.POSTGRESQL: SELECT INDOSSIER.iddom, INDOSSIER.iddoss, INCOMPUN.idproced, INDOSSIER.iduti, INDOSSIER.iddirect, INDOSSIER.idserv, INCOMPUN.lbproced, DIR.lbdirect, SERV.lbserv, UTI.lbuti FROM INDOSSIER LEFT JOIN (SELECT INDIREC.iddirect, INDIREC.lbdirect FROM INDIREC) as DIR ON INDOSSIER.iddirect=DIR.iddirect LEFT JOIN (SELECT INSERV.idserv, INSERV.lbserv FROM INSERV) as SERV ON INDOSSIER.idserv=SERV.idserv LEFT JOIN (SELECT INUTI.idutil, INUTI.lbuti FROM INUTI) as UTI ON INDOSSIER.iduti=UTI.idutil LEFT JOIN INCOMPUN ON INDOSSIER.iddom=INCOMPUN.iddom AND INDOSSIER.iddoss=INCOMPUN.iddoss AND INCOMPUN.defaut=-1 AND INDOSSIER.etatdos<>'A'

Vue.libelle: Vue de la liste de sélection du réprésentant à associer à un intervenant
Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT idtiers, idrepresentant, titre, libelle FROM (SELECT TR.idtiers, TR.idcompteur idrepresentant, TR.titre, RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(TG.abregenre,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(DT.prenom,'') + ' ' + DT.nom)) libelle FROM TIREPRES TR, DOMTIERS DT LEFT JOIN TIGENRE TG ON (DT.idgenre = TG.idgenre) WHERE TR.typerepres = '*' AND TR.actif = -1 AND TR.codtiers = DT.iddoss) TIERS UNION SELECT idtiers, idrepresentant, titre, libelle FROM (SELECT TR.idtiers, TR.idcompteur idrepresentant, TR.titre, RTRIM(LTRIM(ISNULL(TG.abregenre,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(TR.prenom,'') + ' ' + TR.nom)) libelle FROM TIREPRES TR LEFT JOIN TIGENRE TG ON (TR.genre = TG.idgenre) WHERE TR.typerepres = '*' AND TR.actif = -1 AND TR.codtiers is null) REPRES
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT idtiers, idrepresentant, titre, libelle FROM (SELECT TR.idtiers, TR.idcompteur idrepresentant, TR.titre, RTRIM(LTRIM(TG.abregenre || ' ' || DT.prenom || ' ' || DT.nom)) libelle FROM TIREPRES TR, DOMTIERS DT, TIGENRE TG WHERE TR.typerepres = '*' AND TR.actif = -1 AND TR.codtiers = DT.iddoss AND DT.idgenre = TG.idgenre(+)) TIERS UNION SELECT idtiers, idrepresentant, titre, libelle FROM (SELECT TR.idtiers, TR.idcompteur idrepresentant, TR.titre, RTRIM(LTRIM(TG.abregenre || ' ' || TR.prenom || ' ' || TR.nom)) libelle FROM TIREPRES TR, TIGENRE TG WHERE TR.typerepres = '*' AND TR.actif = -1 AND TR.genre = TG.idgenre(+) AND TR.codtiers is null) REPRES
Vue.POSTGRESQL: SELECT idtiers, idrepresentant, titre, libelle FROM (SELECT TR.idtiers, TR.idcompteur idrepresentant, TR.titre, RTRIM(LTRIM(coalesce(TG.abregenre,'') || ' ' || coalesce(DT.prenom,'') || ' ' || DT.nom)) libelle FROM TIREPRES TR, DOMTIERS DT LEFT JOIN TIGENRE TG ON (DT.idgenre = TG.idgenre) WHERE TR.typerepres = cast('*' as text) AND TR.actif = -1 AND TR.codtiers = DT.iddoss) TIERS UNION SELECT idtiers, idrepresentant, titre, libelle FROM (SELECT TR.idtiers, TR.idcompteur idrepresentant, TR.titre, RTRIM(LTRIM(coalesce(TG.abregenre,'') || ' ' || coalesce(TR.prenom,'') || ' ' || TR.nom)) libelle FROM TIREPRES TR LEFT JOIN TIGENRE TG ON (TR.genre = TG.idgenre) WHERE TR.typerepres = cast('*' as text) AND TR.actif = -1 AND TR.codtiers is null) REPRES

Vue.libelle: Vue de la liste d'affichage des localisations d'un dossier
Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT INLOCALDOS.iddom, INLOCALDOS.iddoss, INLOCALDOS.idlocal, INLOCALIS.lblocal, CAST(CAST(CAST(INLOCALDOS.pctnumer AS DECIMAL)/CAST(INLOCALDOS.pctdenom AS DECIMAL)*100 AS DECIMAL(5,2)) AS VARCHAR(6)) + ' %' pourcentage FROM INLOCALDOS, INLOCALIS WHERE INLOCALDOS.idlocal=INLOCALIS.idlocal
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT INLOCALDOS.iddom, INLOCALDOS.iddoss, INLOCALDOS.idlocal, INLOCALIS.lblocal, CAST(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND(INLOCALDOS.pctnumer/INLOCALDOS.pctdenom*100,2), '999990.99')) AS VARCHAR2(6)) || ' %' pourcentage FROM INLOCALDOS, INLOCALIS WHERE INLOCALDOS.idlocal=INLOCALIS.idlocal
Vue.POSTGRESQL: SELECT INLOCALDOS.iddom, INLOCALDOS.iddoss, INLOCALDOS.idlocal, INLOCALIS.lblocal, CAST(CAST(CAST(INLOCALDOS.pctnumer AS DECIMAL)/CAST(INLOCALDOS.pctdenom AS DECIMAL)*100 AS DECIMAL(5,2)) AS VARCHAR(6)) || ' %' pourcentage FROM INLOCALDOS, INLOCALIS WHERE INLOCALDOS.idlocal=INLOCALIS.idlocal

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT INELEMDOS.iddom, INELEMDOS.iddoss, INELEMDOS.idetape, INELEMDOS.idaction, INELEMDOS.idacteur, DOMTIERS.iddoss idtiers, DOMTIERS.lbdoss lbtiers, DOMTIERS.idref FROM INELEMDOS, DOMTIERS WHERE DOMTIERS.iddoss != INELEMDOS.idtiers GROUP BY INELEMDOS.iddom, INELEMDOS.iddoss, INELEMDOS.idetape,INELEMDOS.idaction,INELEMDOS.idacteur,DOMTIERS.iddoss,DOMTIERS.lbdoss,DOMTIERS.idref
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT INELEMDOS.iddom, INELEMDOS.iddoss, INELEMDOS.idetape, INELEMDOS.idaction, INELEMDOS.idacteur, DOMTIERS.iddoss idtiers, DOMTIERS.lbdoss lbtiers, DOMTIERS.idref FROM INELEMDOS, DOMTIERS WHERE DOMTIERS.iddoss != INELEMDOS.idtiers GROUP BY INELEMDOS.iddom, INELEMDOS.iddoss, INELEMDOS.idetape,INELEMDOS.idaction,INELEMDOS.idacteur,DOMTIERS.iddoss,DOMTIERS.lbdoss,DOMTIERS.idref
Vue.POSTGRESQL: SELECT INELEMDOS.iddom, INELEMDOS.iddoss, INELEMDOS.idetape, INELEMDOS.idaction, INELEMDOS.idacteur, DOMTIERS.iddoss idtiers, DOMTIERS.lbdoss lbtiers, DOMTIERS.idref FROM INELEMDOS, DOMTIERS WHERE DOMTIERS.iddoss != INELEMDOS.idtiers GROUP BY INELEMDOS.iddom, INELEMDOS.iddoss, INELEMDOS.idetape,INELEMDOS.idaction,INELEMDOS.idacteur,DOMTIERS.iddoss,DOMTIERS.lbdoss,DOMTIERS.idref

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT INCORRELATION.iddom, INCORRELATION.iddoss, INCORRELATION.datecreation, ORIGINECORRE.lbval + ' - ' + TYPECORRE.lbval as provenance, CASE WHEN( INCORRELATION.reference NOT LIKE '%/%' ) THEN INCORRELATION.reference ELSE REVERSE(SUBSTRING(REVERSE(INCORRELATION.reference), 0, CHARINDEX('/', REVERSE(INCORRELATION.reference)))) END codereferent, INCORRELATION.reference, ORIGINECORRE.valeur as origineentite, TYPECORRE.valeur as typecorrelation FROM INCORRELATION INNER JOIN INVAL ORIGINECORRE ON ORIGINECORRE.VALEUR = INCORRELATION.ORIGINEENTITE AND ORIGINECORRE.IDCODIF = 'ORIGINECORRELATION' INNER JOIN INVAL TYPECORRE ON TYPECORRE.VALEUR = INCORRELATION.TYPECORRELATION AND TYPECORRE.IDCODIF = 'TYPCORRELATION';
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT INCORRELATION.iddom, INCORRELATION.iddoss, INCORRELATION.datecreation, ORIGINECORRE.lbval || ' - ' || TYPECORRE.lbval as provenance, SUBSTR(INCORRELATION.reference, INSTR(INCORRELATION.reference, '/',-1)+1) as codereferent, INCORRELATION.reference, ORIGINECORRE.valeur as origineentite, TYPECORRE.valeur as typecorrelation FROM INCORRELATION INNER JOIN INVAL ORIGINECORRE ON ORIGINECORRE.VALEUR = INCORRELATION.ORIGINEENTITE AND ORIGINECORRE.IDCODIF = 'ORIGINECORRELATION' INNER JOIN INVAL TYPECORRE ON TYPECORRE.VALEUR = INCORRELATION.TYPECORRELATION AND TYPECORRE.IDCODIF = 'TYPCORRELATION'

Vue.SQLSERVER: select INCPDOSMODDOC.iddom, INCPDOSMODDOC.iddoss, INELEMDOS.idetape, INCPDOSMODDOC.idaction, INELEMDOS.idacteur, INELEMDOS.idtiers, INELEMDOS.idactelem, INCPDOSMODDOC.idmod, INCPDOSMOD.modele, INCPDOSMODDOC.origine, INVAL_ORIGINE.lbval lborigine, refexterne,refinterne, dtemission, INCPDOSMODDOC.objetdoc, INVAL_OBJET.lbval lbobjetdoc, INCPDOSMODDOC.typedoc, INVAL_TYPEDOC.lbval lbtypedoc, docprinc FROM INELEMDOS INNER JOIN INCPDOSMOD ON INELEMDOS.iddom=INCPDOSMOD.iddom AND INELEMDOS.iddoss=INCPDOSMOD.iddoss AND INELEMDOS.idaction=INCPDOSMOD.idaction INNER JOIN INCPDOSMODDOC ON INCPDOSMOD.iddom=INCPDOSMODDOC.iddom AND INCPDOSMOD.iddoss=INCPDOSMODDOC.iddoss AND INCPDOSMOD.idaction=INCPDOSMODDOC.idaction AND INCPDOSMOD.idmod=INCPDOSMODDOC.idmod LEFT JOIN INVAL INVAL_ORIGINE ON 'ORIGINEDOC'=INVAL_ORIGINE.idcodif AND INCPDOSMODDOC.origine = INVAL_ORIGINE.valeur LEFT JOIN INVAL INVAL_OBJET ON 'OBJETDOC'=INVAL_OBJET.idcodif AND INCPDOSMODDOC.objetdoc = INVAL_OBJET.valeur LEFT JOIN INVAL INVAL_TYPEDOC ON 'TYPEDOC'=INVAL_TYPEDOC.idcodif AND INCPDOSMODDOC.typedoc = INVAL_TYPEDOC.valeur
Vue.ORACLE: select INCPDOSMODDOC.iddom, INCPDOSMODDOC.iddoss, INELEMDOS.idetape, INCPDOSMODDOC.idaction, INELEMDOS.idacteur, INELEMDOS.idtiers, INELEMDOS.idactelem, INCPDOSMODDOC.idmod, INCPDOSMOD.modele, INCPDOSMODDOC.origine, INVAL_ORIGINE.lbval lborigine, refexterne,refinterne, dtemission, INCPDOSMODDOC.objetdoc, INVAL_OBJET.lbval lbobjetdoc, INCPDOSMODDOC.typedoc, INVAL_TYPEDOC.lbval lbtypedoc, docprinc FROM INELEMDOS,INCPDOSMOD, INCPDOSMODDOC, INVAL INVAL_ORIGINE, INVAL INVAL_OBJET,INVAL INVAL_TYPEDOC WHERE INELEMDOS.iddom=INCPDOSMOD.iddom AND INELEMDOS.iddoss=INCPDOSMOD.iddoss AND INELEMDOS.idaction=INCPDOSMOD.idaction AND INCPDOSMOD.iddom=INCPDOSMODDOC.iddom AND INCPDOSMOD.iddoss=INCPDOSMODDOC.iddoss AND INCPDOSMOD.idaction=INCPDOSMODDOC.idaction AND INCPDOSMOD.idmod=INCPDOSMODDOC.idmod AND 'ORIGINEDOC'=INVAL_ORIGINE.idcodif(+) AND INCPDOSMODDOC.origine = INVAL_ORIGINE.valeur(+) AND 'OBJETDOC'=INVAL_OBJET.idcodif(+) AND INCPDOSMODDOC.objetdoc = INVAL_OBJET.valeur(+) AND 'TYPEDOC'=INVAL_TYPEDOC.idcodif(+) AND INCPDOSMODDOC.typedoc = INVAL_TYPEDOC.valeur(+)
Vue.POSTGRESQL: select INCPDOSMODDOC.iddom, INCPDOSMODDOC.iddoss, INELEMDOS.idetape, INCPDOSMODDOC.idaction, INELEMDOS.idacteur, INELEMDOS.idtiers, INELEMDOS.idactelem, INCPDOSMODDOC.idmod, INCPDOSMOD.modele, INCPDOSMODDOC.origine, INVAL_ORIGINE.lbval lborigine, refexterne,refinterne, dtemission, INCPDOSMODDOC.objetdoc, INVAL_OBJET.lbval lbobjetdoc, INCPDOSMODDOC.typedoc, INVAL_TYPEDOC.lbval lbtypedoc, docprinc FROM INELEMDOS INNER JOIN INCPDOSMOD ON INELEMDOS.iddom=INCPDOSMOD.iddom AND INELEMDOS.iddoss=INCPDOSMOD.iddoss AND INELEMDOS.idaction=INCPDOSMOD.idaction INNER JOIN INCPDOSMODDOC ON INCPDOSMOD.iddom=INCPDOSMODDOC.iddom AND INCPDOSMOD.iddoss=INCPDOSMODDOC.iddoss AND INCPDOSMOD.idaction=INCPDOSMODDOC.idaction AND INCPDOSMOD.idmod=INCPDOSMODDOC.idmod LEFT JOIN INVAL INVAL_ORIGINE ON 'ORIGINEDOC'=INVAL_ORIGINE.idcodif AND INCPDOSMODDOC.origine = INVAL_ORIGINE.valeur LEFT JOIN INVAL INVAL_OBJET ON 'OBJETDOC'=INVAL_OBJET.idcodif AND INCPDOSMODDOC.objetdoc = INVAL_OBJET.valeur LEFT JOIN INVAL INVAL_TYPEDOC ON 'TYPEDOC'=INVAL_TYPEDOC.idcodif AND INCPDOSMODDOC.typedoc = INVAL_TYPEDOC.valeur

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT INREGRDOS1.iddom, INREGRDOS1.iddoss, INREGRDOS1.idhier, INHIERAR.lbhier ,INLOCALIS1.idtyploc idtypcrit1, INTYPLOCAL1.lbtypl lbtypcrit1, INREGRDOS1.ident idcrit1, INLOCALIS1.lblocal lbcrit1, INLOCALIS1.idadm idadm1 ,INLOCALIS2.idtyploc idtypcrit2, INTYPLOCAL2.lbtypl lbtypcrit2, INREGRDOS2.ident idcrit2, INLOCALIS2.lblocal lbcrit2, INLOCALIS2.idadm idadm2 ,INLOCALIS3.idtyploc idtypcrit3, INTYPLOCAL3.lbtypl lbtypcrit3, INREGRDOS3.ident idcrit3, INLOCALIS3.lblocal lbcrit3, INLOCALIS3.idadm idadm3 ,INLOCALIS4.idtyploc idtypcrit4, INTYPLOCAL4.lbtypl lbtypcrit4, INREGRDOS4.ident idcrit4, INLOCALIS4.lblocal lbcrit4, INLOCALIS4.idadm idadm4 ,INLOCALIS5.idtyploc idtypcrit5, INTYPLOCAL5.lbtypl lbtypcrit5, INREGRDOS5.ident idcrit5, INLOCALIS5.lblocal lbcrit5, INLOCALIS5.idadm idadm5 FROM INHIERAR INNER JOIN INREGRDOS INREGRDOS1 ON INHIERAR.idhier=INREGRDOS1.idhier AND INREGRDOS1.identmere='*' INNER JOIN INLOCALIS INLOCALIS1 ON INREGRDOS1.ident=INLOCALIS1.idlocal INNER JOIN INTYPLOCAL INTYPLOCAL1 ON INLOCALIS1.idtyploc=INTYPLOCAL1.idtyploc LEFT JOIN INREGRDOS INREGRDOS2 ON INREGRDOS1.iddom=INREGRDOS2.iddom AND INREGRDOS1.iddoss=INREGRDOS2.iddoss AND INREGRDOS1.idhier=INREGRDOS2.idhier AND INREGRDOS1.ident=INREGRDOS2.identmere LEFT JOIN INLOCALIS INLOCALIS2 ON INREGRDOS2.ident=INLOCALIS2.idlocal LEFT JOIN INTYPLOCAL INTYPLOCAL2 ON INLOCALIS2.idtyploc=INTYPLOCAL2.idtyploc LEFT JOIN INREGRDOS INREGRDOS3 ON INREGRDOS2.iddom=INREGRDOS3.iddom AND INREGRDOS2.iddoss=INREGRDOS3.iddoss AND INREGRDOS2.idhier=INREGRDOS3.idhier AND INREGRDOS2.ident=INREGRDOS3.identmere LEFT JOIN INLOCALIS INLOCALIS3 ON INREGRDOS3.ident=INLOCALIS3.idlocal LEFT JOIN INTYPLOCAL INTYPLOCAL3 ON INLOCALIS3.idtyploc=INTYPLOCAL3.idtyploc LEFT JOIN INREGRDOS INREGRDOS4 ON INREGRDOS3.iddom=INREGRDOS4.iddom AND INREGRDOS3.iddoss=INREGRDOS4.iddoss AND INREGRDOS3.idhier=INREGRDOS4.idhier AND INREGRDOS3.ident=INREGRDOS4.identmere LEFT JOIN INLOCALIS INLOCALIS4 ON INREGRDOS4.ident=INLOCALIS4.idlocal LEFT JOIN INTYPLOCAL INTYPLOCAL4 ON INLOCALIS4.idtyploc=INTYPLOCAL4.idtyploc LEFT JOIN INREGRDOS INREGRDOS5 ON INREGRDOS4.iddom=INREGRDOS5.iddom AND INREGRDOS4.iddoss=INREGRDOS5.iddoss AND INREGRDOS4.idhier=INREGRDOS5.idhier AND INREGRDOS4.ident=INREGRDOS5.identmere LEFT JOIN INLOCALIS INLOCALIS5 ON INREGRDOS5.ident=INLOCALIS5.idlocal LEFT JOIN INTYPLOCAL INTYPLOCAL5 ON INLOCALIS5.idtyploc=INTYPLOCAL5.idtyploc
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT INREGRDOS1.iddom, INREGRDOS1.iddoss , INREGRDOS1.idhier, INHIERAR.lbhier , INLOCALIS1.idtyploc idtypcrit1, INTYPLOCAL1.lbtypl lbtypcrit1 , INREGRDOS1.ident idcrit1, INLOCALIS1.lblocal lbcrit1 , INLOCALIS1.idadm idadm1 , INLOCALIS2.idtyploc idtypcrit2, INTYPLOCAL2.lbtypl lbtypcrit2 , INREGRDOS2.ident idcrit2, INLOCALIS2.lblocal lbcrit2 , INLOCALIS2.idadm idadm2 , INLOCALIS3.idtyploc idtypcrit3, INTYPLOCAL3.lbtypl lbtypcrit3 , INREGRDOS3.ident idcrit3, INLOCALIS3.lblocal lbcrit3 , INLOCALIS3.idadm idadm3 , INLOCALIS4.idtyploc idtypcrit4, INTYPLOCAL4.lbtypl lbtypcrit4 , INREGRDOS4.ident idcrit4, INLOCALIS4.lblocal lbcrit4 , INLOCALIS4.idadm idadm4 , INLOCALIS5.idtyploc idtypcrit5, INTYPLOCAL5.lbtypl lbtypcrit5 , INREGRDOS5.ident idcrit5, INLOCALIS5.lblocal lbcrit5 , INLOCALIS5.idadm idadm5 FROM INHIERAR , INREGRDOS INREGRDOS1, INTYPLOCAL INTYPLOCAL1, INLOCALIS INLOCALIS1 , INREGRDOS INREGRDOS2, INTYPLOCAL INTYPLOCAL2, INLOCALIS INLOCALIS2 , INREGRDOS INREGRDOS3, INTYPLOCAL INTYPLOCAL3, INLOCALIS INLOCALIS3 , INREGRDOS INREGRDOS4, INTYPLOCAL INTYPLOCAL4, INLOCALIS INLOCALIS4 , INREGRDOS INREGRDOS5, INTYPLOCAL INTYPLOCAL5, INLOCALIS INLOCALIS5 WHERE INHIERAR.idhier=INREGRDOS1.idhier AND INREGRDOS1.identmere='*' AND INREGRDOS1.ident=INLOCALIS1.idlocal AND INLOCALIS1.idtyploc=INTYPLOCAL1.idtyploc AND INREGRDOS1.iddom=INREGRDOS2.iddom(+) AND INREGRDOS1.iddoss=INREGRDOS2.iddoss(+) AND INREGRDOS1.idhier=INREGRDOS2.idhier(+) AND INREGRDOS1.ident=INREGRDOS2.identmere(+) AND INREGRDOS2.ident=INLOCALIS2.idlocal (+) AND INLOCALIS2.idtyploc=INTYPLOCAL2.idtyploc(+) AND INREGRDOS2.iddom=INREGRDOS3.iddom(+) AND INREGRDOS2.iddoss=INREGRDOS3.iddoss(+) AND INREGRDOS2.idhier=INREGRDOS3.idhier(+) AND INREGRDOS2.ident=INREGRDOS3.identmere(+) AND INREGRDOS3.ident=INLOCALIS3.idlocal (+) AND INLOCALIS3.idtyploc=INTYPLOCAL3.idtyploc(+) AND Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT A.iddom,A.iddoss,A.idetape,INSETAP.lbetape,A.idaction,A.lbaction,A.idacteur,INACTEUR.lbacteur,A.idtiers,DOMTIERS.lbdoss lbtiers,A.idactelem,A.idref,A.dtprev,A.dtcreat,A.dtreal,A.numordre,A.dtmaj,A.hrmaj,CAST(INDESCELEMDOS.ficdesc AS VARCHAR(4000)) notedesc,INCPETADOS.gantt,(CASE WHEN dtreal is null THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) real FROM INELEMDOS A INNER JOIN INSETAP ON A.iddom=INSETAP.iddom AND A.iddoss=INSETAP.iddoss AND A.idetape=INSETAP.idetape LEFT JOIN INACTEUR ON A.idacteur=INACTEUR.idacteur LEFT JOIN DOMTIERS ON A.idtiers=DOMTIERS.iddoss LEFT JOIN INDESC INDESCELEMDOS ON UPPER(nomaxe)='INELEMDOS' AND A.iddom=INDESCELEMDOS.critere1 AND A.iddoss=INDESCELEMDOS.critere2 AND A.idetape=INDESCELEMDOS.critere3 AND A.idaction=INDESCELEMDOS.critere4 AND A.idacteur=INDESCELEMDOS.critere5 AND A.idtiers=INDESCELEMDOS.critere6 LEFT JOIN INCPETADOS ON A.IDDOM=INCPETADOS.IDDOM AND A.IDDOSS=INCPETADOS.IDDOSS AND A.IDETAPE=INCPETADOS.IDETAPE AND A.IDACTION=INCPETADOS.IDACTION
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT A.iddom,A.iddoss,A.idetape,INSETAP.lbetape,A.idaction,A.lbaction,A.idacteur,INACTEUR.lbacteur,A.idtiers,DOMTIERS.lbdoss lbtiers,A.idactelem,A.idref,A.dtprev,A.dtcreat,A.dtreal,A.numordre,A.dtmaj,A.hrmaj,INDESCELEMDOS.notedesc,INCPETADOS.GANTT,(CASE WHEN dtreal is null THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) AS real FROM INELEMDOS A,INSETAP,INACTEUR,DOMTIERS,INCPETADOS,(SELECT critere1 iddom,critere2 iddoss,critere3 idetape,critere4 idaction,critere5 idacteur,critere6 idtiers,mg_f_long2varchar('INDESC','ficdesc',INDESC.rowid) notedesc FROM INDESC WHERE UPPER(nomaxe)='INELEMDOS' AND ficdesc IS NOT NULL) INDESCELEMDOS WHERE A.iddom=INSETAP.iddom AND A.iddoss=INSETAP.iddoss AND A.idetape=INSETAP.idetape AND A.idacteur=INACTEUR.idacteur(+) AND A.idtiers=DOMTIERS.iddoss(+) AND A.iddom=INDESCELEMDOS.iddom(+) AND A.iddoss=INDESCELEMDOS.iddoss(+) AND A.idetape=INDESCELEMDOS.idetape(+) AND A.idaction=INDESCELEMDOS.idaction(+) AND A.idacteur=INDESCELEMDOS.idacteur(+) AND A.idtiers=INDESCELEMDOS.idtiers(+) AND A.IDDOM=INCPETADOS.IDDOM(+) AND A.IDDOSS=INCPETADOS.IDDOSS(+) AND A.IDETAPE=INCPETADOS.IDETAPE(+) AND A.IDACTION=INCPETADOS.IDACTION(+)
Vue.POSTGRESQL: SELECT A.iddom,A.iddoss,A.idetape,INSETAP.lbetape,A.idaction,A.lbaction,A.idacteur,INACTEUR.lbacteur,A.idtiers,DOMTIERS.lbdoss lbtiers,A.idactelem,A.idref,A.dtprev,A.dtcreat,A.dtreal,A.numordre,A.dtmaj,A.hrmaj,CAST(INDESCELEMDOS.ficdesc AS VARCHAR(4000)) notedesc,INCPETADOS.gantt,(CASE WHEN dtreal is null THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) "real" FROM INELEMDOS A INNER JOIN INSETAP ON A.iddom=INSETAP.iddom AND A.iddoss= INSETAP.iddoss AND A.idetape= INSETAP.idetape LEFT JOIN INACTEUR ON A.idacteur= INACTEUR.idacteur LEFT JOIN DOMTIERS ON A.idtiers= DOMTIERS.iddoss LEFT JOIN INDESC INDESCELEMDOS ON UPPER(nomaxe)='INELEMDOS' AND A.iddom=INDESCELEMDOS.critere1 AND A.iddoss= INDESCELEMDOS.critere2 AND A.idetape= INDESCELEMDOS.critere3 AND A.idaction= INDESCELEMDOS.critere4 AND A.idacteur= INDESCELEMDOS.critere5 AND A.idtiers= INDESCELEMDOS.critere6 LEFT JOIN INCPETADOS ON A.IDDOM= INCPETADOS.IDDOM AND A.IDDOSS= INCPETADOS.IDDOSS AND A.IDETAPE= INCPETADOS.IDETAPE AND A.IDACTION= INCPETADOS.IDACTION

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT iddom,iddoss,idaction,lbaction, nataction , MIN(dtreal) dtrealmin, max(dtreal)dtrealmax, SUM(Nb) nb, SUM(NbReal) nbreal FROM ( SELECT A.iddom,A.iddoss, A.idaction,A.lbaction,nataction , dtreal,1 Nb,(CASE WHEN dtreal is null THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) NbReal FROM INELEMDOS A,INCPDOS WHERE A.iddom=INCPDOS.iddom AND A.iddoss=INCPDOS.iddoss AND A.idaction=INCPDOS.idaction ) A group by iddom,iddoss,idaction,lbaction, nataction
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT iddom,iddoss,idaction,lbaction, nataction , MIN(dtreal) dtrealmin, max(dtreal)dtrealmax, SUM(Nb) nb, SUM(NbReal) nbReal FROM ( SELECT A.iddom,A.iddoss, A.idaction,A.lbaction,nataction , dtreal,1 Nb,(CASE WHEN dtreal is null THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) NbReal FROM INELEMDOS A,INCPDOS WHERE A.iddom=INCPDOS.iddom AND A.iddoss=INCPDOS.iddoss AND A.idaction=INCPDOS.idaction ) A group by iddom,iddoss,idaction,lbaction, nataction

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT A.iddom, A.iddoss, A.idacteur, INACTEUR.lbacteur, A.idtiers, DOMTIERS.lbdoss lbtiers, A.coderib , (CASE WHEN A.codiban IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE A.codiban + A.coderib END) codiban , A.idrepresentant idrepres, CAST(TIREPRES.titre + ' ' + TIREPRES.nom + ' ' + TIREPRES.prenom AS VARCHAR(150)) lbrepres FROM INACTDOS A INNER JOIN INACTEUR ON A.idacteur=INACTEUR.idacteur INNER JOIN DOMTIERS ON A.idtiers=DOMTIERS.iddoss LEFT JOIN TIREPRES ON A.idtiers=TIREPRES.idtiers AND A.idrepresentant=TIREPRES.idcompteur AND TIREPRES.typerepres='*'
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT A.iddom, A.iddoss, A.idacteur, INACTEUR.lbacteur, A.idtiers, DOMTIERS.lbdoss lbtiers, A.coderib, DECODE(A.codiban, NULL, NULL, A.codiban || A.coderib) codiban , A.idrepresentant idrepres, CAST(TIREPRES.titre || ' ' || TIREPRES.nom || ' ' || TIREPRES.prenom AS VARCHAR2(150)) lbrepres FROM INACTDOS A, INACTEUR, DOMTIERS, TIREPRES WHERE A.idacteur = INACTEUR.idacteur AND A.idtiers=DOMTIERS.iddoss AND A.idtiers=TIREPRES.idtiers(+) AND A.idrepresentant=TIREPRES.idcompteur(+) AND TIREPRES.typerepres(+)='*'
Vue.POSTGRESQL: SELECT A.iddom, A.iddoss, A.idacteur, INACTEUR.lbacteur, A.idtiers, DOMTIERS.lbdoss lbtiers, A.coderib , (CASE WHEN A.codiban IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE A.codiban || A.coderib END) codiban , A.idrepresentant idrepres, CAST(TIREPRES.titre || ' ' || TIREPRES.nom || ' ' || TIREPRES.prenom AS VARCHAR(150)) lbrepres FROM INACTDOS A INNER JOIN INACTEUR ON A.idacteur=INACTEUR.idacteur INNER JOIN DOMTIERS ON A.idtiers=DOMTIERS.iddoss LEFT JOIN TIREPRES ON A.idtiers=TIREPRES.idtiers AND A.idrepresentant=TIREPRES.idcompteur AND TIREPRES.typerepres=cast('*' as text)

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT A.iddom,A.iddoss,INLOCALDOS.idlocal,INLOCALIS.lblocal,INLOCALIS.idtyploc,INTYPLOCAL.lbtypl lbtyploc,INLOCALIS.idadm, CAST((CASE WHEN INLOCALDOS.idlocal IS Null THEN 0 ELSE INLOCALDOS.pctnumer/ISNULL(INLOCALDOS.pctdenom,1) END) AS Money) txattrib FROM INDOSSIER A LEFT JOIN INLOCALDOS ON A.iddom=INLOCALDOS.iddom AND A.iddoss=INLOCALDOS.iddoss LEFT JOIN INLOCALIS ON INLOCALDOS.idlocal = INLOCALIS.idlocal LEFT JOIN INTYPLOCAL ON INLOCALIS.idtyploc=INTYPLOCAL.idtyploc
Vue.ORACLE: SELECT A.iddom, A.iddoss, INLOCALDOS.idlocal, INLOCALIS.lblocal, INLOCALIS.idtyploc, INTYPLOCAL.lbtypl lbtyploc, INLOCALIS.idadm, CAST((CASE WHEN INLOCALDOS.idlocal IS Null THEN 0 ELSE INLOCALDOS.pctnumer/nvl(INLOCALDOS.pctdenom,1) END) AS NUMBER(5,4)) txattrib FROM INDOSSIER A,INLOCALIS, INLOCALDOS,INTYPLOCAL WHERE A.iddom=INLOCALDOS.iddom(+) AND A.iddoss=INLOCALDOS.iddoss(+) AND INLOCALDOS.idlocal = INLOCALIS.idlocal(+) AND INLOCALIS.idtyploc=INTYPLOCAL.idtyploc(+)

Vue.SQLSERVER: SELECT A.idutil iduti, A.lbuti , A.nomuti, A.preuti, A.idgenre, TIGENRE.lbgenre, INPROF.idprofil idprof, INPROF.lbprof lbprof, INSERV.idserv , INSERV.lbserv, INSERV.idref refserv, INDIREC.iddirect, INDIREC.lbdirect, INDIREC.idref refdirect, INGRDIR.idgrdir, INGRDIR.lbgrdir, INGRDIR.idref refgrdir, INUNITE.idunite, INUNITE.lbunite, INUNITE.idref refunite, A.telephon,A.email, A.actif, (CASE WHEN preuti is null THEN -1 ELSE 0 END) fictif, A.postwin, A.idfonction, INVAL_FONCTION.lbval lbfonction FROM INUTI A LEFT JOIN (SELECT idutil iduti, idprofil idprof FROM INPROFU WHERE defaut=-1) PROFU ON A.idutil = PROFU.iduti LEFT JOIN INPROF ON PROFU.idprof=INPROF.idprofil LEFT JOIN INSERV ON A.idserv=INSERV.idserv LEFT JOIN INDIREC ON INSERV.iddirect=INDIREC.iddirect LEFT JOIN INGRDIR ON INDIREC.idgrdir=INGRDIR.idgrdir LEFT JOIN INUNITE ON INGRDIR.idunite=INUNITE.idunite LEFT JOIN TIGENRE ON A.idgenre=TIGENRE.idgenre LEFT JOIN INVAL INVAL_FONCTION ON 'FONCTIONUTIL'=INVAL_FONCTION.idcodif AND A.idfonction= INVAL_FONCTION.valeur WHERE A.extranet=0
